title: Update a Public Project Website
description: A project manager needs to post a weekly update on a major infrastructure project's public-facing website.

tasks.description: Log in to the content management system (CMS) for the project website.
Draft a new post summarizing the week's progress, any new milestones, and upcoming traffic changes.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager writes a clear and informative update for the public.

tasks.description: Publish the new post to the website.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager successfully publishes the update.
